articles.title: UK inflation falls as food and eating out costs ease - BBC.com
articles.description: February's drop to 3.4% means the cost of living is now rising at its slowest pace since September 2021.

articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: Helldivers 2 Patch 1.000.103 Nerfs Planet Hazards, Patrols Spawning on Players, and More - IGN
articles.description: Helldivers 2 update 1.000.103 is out now across PC and PS5. Check out the patch notes.
articles.content:
Helldivers 2 developer Arrowhead has released another patch for the PC and PlayStation 5 co-op shooter, this time nerfing the recently added planet hazards.
Patch 1.000.103 adjusts the spawn rates f… [+4715 chars]
